Name: Skotos
About the game: Skotos is an intense first-person platformer that explores the fear of darkness. Players will journey through ominous environments while solving platforming puzzles, exploring unknown territory, and facing their greatest fears. Physics-Based Lantern Trapped in complete Darkness, use your physics based lantern to light your way. Psychological Platforming Brave the darkness with your trusty lantern as you platform in complete darkness. Horrors Of The Darkness The darkness can manifest itself in many forms.
